author: torben
title: CrypTrolls: A DAO Gaming Experience
description: With centrally organized gaming companies, the users(gamers) lack governance possibilities within their own games. It's time to change this!
solution: DAO's make it possible to step away from centralized organizations. With this project, we will achieve this: gamers in control!
experience: Business and Project Mangement, Etrepreneurship, Tokennomics, Design, Game Development, Blockchain Development, Plutus and Atala Pioneers
